title: PBE OCE
body:
PBE is in NA and EUW, but not able to sign in for OCE. I'm not saying that there should be PBE for oce, but we should be allowed to register to go in the draw if u want to call it to test the cycle every cycle or so. The whole OCE community is mostly from EUW, NA and other servers, which is why we should be able to register for the PBE cycle.

-Ashfault {{item:3902}}

replies.body: Yes please Rito PBE for OCE would be amazing not everyone has the money if they have already crossed over to oce like some people it would be really great to test stuff out on the OCE servers
